title: Yarmouth (England)
name: The Needles Old Battery and New Battery
address: West High Down, Alum Bay, Isle of Wight, PO39 0JH
content: A very famous headland and offshore rocks at the extreme western end of the island. Here you will find early sea defences such as the Needles Old Battery, now preserved by the National Trust. Accessible via Southern Vectis's open-top bus service "The Needles Tour" (see 'Get around' above).
